Performer:
Yoshida Minoshi (吉田蓑司)

Dates: '1970/06-1979/03'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku (Kokuritsu Gekijo geino kansho koza series); Dejitaru bunka raiburarī (Japan Arts Council)


– Click image to view.
